PocketMage

Web Installer

Flash firmware to your PocketMage via USB

Installation Modes

Update mode flashes only the application partition, preserving your NVS settings, SPIFFS data, and any saved content.

Fresh install mode writes bootloader, partition table, and application. This will erase all stored data and settings.

Select a version to begin
Requirements

This tool requires a Chromium-based browser (Chrome, Edge, Opera) with Web Serial API support.

Connect your device via USB and ensure no other program is using the serial port.
